content: materials yarn aran weight yarn size 4 medium crochet hook o 8 mm crochet hook yarn needle for weave in ends stitch markers scissors notes about design the cold brew sweater is a classic knitted inspired sweater is cozy and has a beautiful drape the sweater is worked in 4 panels assembled at the end the row are worked vertically in double slip stitches to recreate the knitting look of the fisherman ribbing the short row technique is used to create the pattern on the front panel this cold brew sweater has an oversized fit with a positive ease of 26 cm around bust circumference measurements and sizes the cold brew sweater pattern is available in 8 sizes from small up to 5x large the model is 168 cm tall and wears size small neckline a 20 cm 22 22 24 24 25 25 25 bust width b 56 cm 61 68 71 76 81 86 91 sleeve length c 37 cm 37 39 39 40 40 41 41 sleeve width d 19 cm 22 22 25 25 28 28 28 length e 50 cm 53 53 56 56 59 59 59 i used supreme merino by katia in color aubergine 99 each ball has 50 grams and approximately 75 meters yarn composition 45% acrylic - 45% merino - 10% superfine alpacafor each size you will need 13 15 17 18 19 22 23 24 balls or 960 1110 1210 1350 1420 1600 1670 1740 meters
